org.openlcb.implementations.throttle

Class TractionThrottle

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openlcb.AbstractConnection
      • org.openlcb.MessageDecoder
        • org.openlcb.implementations.throttle.TractionThrottle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Connection

    public class TractionThrottle
extends MessageDecoder
    Traction protocol based implementation of the throttle. This differs from ThrottleImplementation in that it uses the TractionControlRequestMessage for talking to the train nodes, including proper allocation and deallocation of throttles.

    Created by bracz on 12/30/15.

      • getConsistList

        public java.util.List<TractionThrottle.ConsistEntry> getConsistList()
        Returns:
        the list of nodes in the consist managed by the assgined node. Entries may be null in case the node list is still being fetched.

      • querySpeed

        public void querySpeed()
        Initiates fetching the current speed from the OpenLCB node. When the speed value arrives, the property change listener will be called on the speed object.

      • queryConsist

        public void queryConsist()
        Initiates fetching consist information from the assigned node. Queryies the length of consist and all consist members.

      • queryConsistMember

        public void queryConsistMember(int index)
        Initiates fetching one consist member from the remote node.

      • queryFunction

        public void queryFunction(int fn)
        Initiates fetching the current value of a given function from the OpenLCB node. When the function value arrives, the property change listener will be called on the function object.
        Parameters:
        fn - the number of the function (address in OLCB land)
